title: Megan Markle's former 'Suits' costar Patrick Adams keeps posting behind-the-scenes Instagram photos of the duchess from her acting days
text:
"Suits" star Patrick Adams just shared a bunch of never-before-seen photos of former costar Meghan Markle from her time on the hit show.

To commemorate the final episode, which airs on Wednesday, Markle's former on-screen husband posted a collection of behind-the-scenes snaps on Instagram showing the cast on set.

Read more: Meghan Markle was filmed dancing with Cape Town locals, and Prince Harry awkwardly tried to join in

"This week the last episode of Suits will air and the nearly 10 year journey we've all been on together will finally be over," he wrote on Instagram.

"So it seems right to post some photos the next couple of days from the early days."

In one photo, Markle, who played paralegal Rachel Zane, is shown standing in front of her trailer, which had her character's name on it.

You can use the arrows below to see the snap, which is the fourth slide in the post.

In the second photo of another post, seen below, Markle is seen relaxing on a couch during some downtime on set. Scroll to the third picture, and you'll just be able to make out Markle — whose face is slightly concealed — posing in a dressing gown and stilettos.

In the photo below, Markle is seen lounging on set with former costar Sarah Rafferty (Donna Paulsen). The second photo shows a black-and-white shot of the royal.

Adams' final post includes three photos of the former actress, including a group shot of the cast and a candid snap of Markle holding an umbrella.

While some of Markle' friends have remained tight-lipped when asked about her new life as a royal, Adams has never been shy about the topic. When the duchess' engagement to Prince Harry was announced in 2016, he took to Twitter to joke about the news.

"She said she was just going out to get some milk..." he wrote.

He added: "Playing Meghan's television partner for the better part of a decade uniquely qualifies me to say this: Your Royal Highness, you are a lucky man and I know your long life together will be joyful, productive, and hilarious.

"Meghan, so happy for you, friend. Much love."

Patrick Adams with wife Troian Bellisario at the wedding of the Duke and Duchess of Sussex. Ian West/WPA Pool/Getty Image

The couple didn't seem to have an issue with Adams' candor, as the actor was photographed attending their wedding at St George's Chapel in May last year.
